import sys

def main():
    answers = [0]*10000
    val = 0
    for i in xrange(1,5000):
        d = i*2
        val += d
        answers[d] = val-i
        answers[d+1] = val
    t = int(raw_input())
    inp = map(int, sys.stdin.read().split())
    out = ""
    for _ in inp:
        out+=str(answers[_])+"\n"
    print out[:-1]
main()
